basic_info.description: I am currently a student at Code Fellows, working towards a Python full-stack coding certification.I am proficient at forming teams and motivating these groups towards an end. I help identify the bigger picture for those I work with. I understand teams work better when they can contextualize the bigger picture. I know I work best as part of something larger than myself. My abilities to switch tasks quickly allows for individuals to work towards their own goals while I can stay connected to the overall task. I am focused on not over-working my team. I want to work with happy people and I think not-work is an important aspect of that. I strive for clear rules on time-lines and expectations. I hope to learn not only the technical aspects of coding but the ins and the outs of an effective coding team. So, my teams can perform even better in the future.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
